subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jim Lemon hit 164 home runs and earned a visit with Dwight D. Eisenhower after slugging three consecutive homers in a game for the Washington Senators in 1956.
snippet: Jim Lemon hit 164 home runs and earned a visit with Dwight D. Eisenhower after slugging three consecutive homers in a game for the Washington Senators in 1956.
